articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Light Comedy "An Echo among the Hills"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Light Comedy "An Echo among the Hills"
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed light comedy "An Echo among the Hills" at the newly constructed State Theatre.
					 The performers truthfully represented the spiritual level of the Korean people in the era of Chollima who dashed ahead like the wind racing against time by vividly depicting the sentiment of the time in the 1960s through refined acting. 
					
					 He acknowledged the enthusiastic cheers of the performers and the audience and congratulated the artistes on their successful presentation. 
					
					 The light comedy is such masterpiece of the era that the more one watches it, the more profound truth of life one grasps, he said, adding that it has such distinguished influence and attraction that it grips the hearts of the audience and gives full play to their mental power. This comedy, therefore, serves as a close companion and a textbook for our army and people in their life, he stressed.
					
					 Noting that the officials, creators and artistes of the State Theatrical Troupe have successfully carried out the Party's task to make the whole country reverberate with the echo among hills, he highly appreciated feat they have performed and extended thanks to them.
					
					 He set forth important tasks to serve as guidelines for creating many more masterpieces like the light comedy and conduct dynamic performing activities. 
					
					 Among the audience were senior party and army officials     Kim Jong Un, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Ki Nam, Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Yang Gon, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su, Mun Kyong Dok, Ju Kyu Chang and Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su, department directors of the NDC, and officials in the fields of literature and arts and media.

articles.title: SPA Chairman Leaves for London
articles.content:
SPA Chairman Leaves for London
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, and his party left here on Saturday by air to visit the UK.

articles.title: El Salvadorian Party Leader on Relations with WPK
articles.content:
El Salvadorian Party Leader on Relations with WPK
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- Medardo Gonzalez, general coordinator of the El Salvadorian Farabundo Marti Front for National Liberation, on March 17 met DPRK Ambassador to Cuba Kwon Sung Chol who participated in the 15th seminar of world political parties on building a new society as a delegate of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 At the meeting he hoped that the WPK and the Korean people would register great successes in their efforts to build a thriving nation and achieve the peaceful reunification of the country under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Front will strive to boost relations with the WPK in the future, too, he said.

articles.title: Mexican Party Leader Praises Songun Politics of DPRK
articles.content:
Mexican Party Leader Praises Songun Politics of DPRK
						
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The Songun politics pursued by General Secretary Kim Jong Il is based on the undying Juche idea. It serves as an all-powerful treasured sword for defending the country and nation's dignity and sovereignty from the U.S. imperialists' constant moves for military aggression and pushing forward the overall socialist construction.
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the C.C., the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, said this on Mar. 18 when meeting Kwon Sung Chol, DPRK ambassador to Cuba who participated in the 15th seminar of world political parties on building a new society as a delegate of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 He further said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il has energetically led the struggle of the Korean people for building a thriving nation and the cause of global independence under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 The People's Socialist Party of Mexico fully supports the WPK's proposals for national reunification and hopes that Korea will be reunified according to the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.
					
					 It sets great store by the relations with the WPK led by Kim Jong Il and will continue developing them in the future, too.

articles.title: Coal Miners Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Coal Miners Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The participants in the meeting of workers in coal industry visited the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill here on Saturday.
					 They laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers and made deep bows to the statue in humble reverence for the President.

articles.title: Organic Fertilizer Factory under Construction in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Organic Fertilizer Factory under Construction in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The construction of an organic composite fertilizer factory is making brisk headway in Pyongyang. 
					 The factory covering tens of thousands of square meters will produce organic composite fertilizer mainly by use of sludge from Pothong River and fly ash from thermal power plants and deposits from sewage treatment plants, etc. as raw materials. 
					
					 When completed, the factory will produce tens of thousands of tons of fertilizer per year.

articles.title: Book about Kim Jong Il's Greatness Published
articles.content:
Book about Kim Jong Il's Greatness Published
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House released Vol. 2 "The Brilliant Songun Commander" of the five-volume book "Comrade Kim Jong Il, Legendary Great Man".
					 It comprehensively deals with the distinguished personality of leader Kim Jong Il as a great person.
					
					 The book has four chapters. 
					
					 The first chapter "The Commander of Mt. Paektu Carrying Forward the Revolutionary Cause of Songun" tells about the greatness of Kim Jong Il who was born as a bright star of Mt. Paektu and has led the Songun revolution to victory with his sagacious intelligence and matchless pluck.
					
					 The second chapter "The Greatest Commander Possessed of Prominent Personality" deals with his distinguished military ability and prominent personality. 
					
					 The third chapter "Peerlessly Brilliant Commander Displaying the Might of the DPRK as a Military Power" deals with the experienced and tested Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il who is steering the struggle to defend socialism to shining victory. 
					
					 The fourth chapter "The Statesman of General Type Who Is Leading the Whole Affairs of the Revolution and Construction with Songun" tells about his greatness as Songun brilliant commander, who set forth the original idea of putting the army ahead of the working class and provided firm foundation of building a thriving socialist nation, regarding the army as the driving force in the era of Songun.

articles.title: Ryongmun Cavern Draws Large Crowd of Visitors
articles.content:
Ryongmun Cavern Draws Large Crowd of Visitors 
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- It is 15 years since General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the Ryongmun Cavern.
					 While visiting the cavern on March 26, 1996, he said that the longer he watches it, the more fantastic it looks. He gave specific instructions to spruce up and preserve beauty spots there, manage and operate the cavern and organize the tour. 
					
					 More than 1.7 million people at home and overseas compatriots and foreigners have visited the cavern for the last 15 years since then. 
					
					 The visitors are admired to see large caves with lots of beautiful stone flowers of diverse shapes, natural ponds shinning with stalactites, underground falls presenting fantastic scenery, etc.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts S. Korea for Sticking to "Cheonan" Case
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts S. Korea for Sticking to "Cheonan" Case
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The Korean Peninsula is now in the worst situation in history in which the vicious cycle of confrontation and clash repeats itself.
					 The south Korean authorities are directly to blame for this. It is because they have pursued the one-sided policy for escalating confrontation, while sticking to the "Cheonan" warship case and the Yonphyong Island shelling with their faces turned away from the DPRK's proposal for unconditional dialogue.
					
					 As already clarified, the "Cheonan" case was the first provocation cooked up by the south Korean authorities to put pressure on the DPRK in all fields in collusion with foreign forces whereas the Yonphyong Island shelling a premeditated provocation to ignite a war against the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean warlike forces are regarding the "Cheonan" case as a golden opportunity for carrying into practice their policy for escalating the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 This year they linked the case with the DPRK in a far-fetched way and brought the preliminary talks for opening the north-south high-level military talks to a rupture. They also staged big Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises targeted against the DPRK in all areas of south Korea in league with the U.S.
					
					 They use the case to justify their moves for war and confrontation and increase the capacity of war hardware.
					
					They openly blustered that they would convert into the offensive one the "defensive conception of checking landing" that remained for mere form's sake in the past. They are now mulling bolstering the marines with more than 27,000-strong forces. It was also reported that almost all those reinforcements would be deployed in the areas along the extension of the Military Demarcation Line in the West Sea of Korea in which the military tensions run high between the two sides.
					
					 They also worked out a plan of fortifying the surroundings of five islands in the West Sea and are contemplating massively deploying K-9 self-propelled artillery pieces, MLRS, new-type anti-artillery radar, surface-to-air missiles, guided missiles for precision attack on coastal artillery pieces and other latest attack weapons and combat equipment in those areas by 2012.
					
					 The south Korean Defense Ministry scheme to increase the combat capacity to the maximum allegedly to cope with the asymmetric combat power of the DPRK while citing the case as a pretext. 
					
					 It recently drafted Plan 307 specifying tasks for defense reform. In the plan it did not hide that it would allocate a huge amount of fund to purchasing fighters with stealth function, high-altitude unmanned reconnaissance planes and other latest military hardware. 
					
					 Who proposed multi-faceted dialogue between the north and the south and worked hard for concord between the two sides, not bound to the past? And who is staging big joint military exercises in collusion with foreign forces and introducing the latest war hardware, not content with mocking at the dialogue partner while talking about "sincerity"?
					
					 All the political and military phenomena taking place in the north and the south of Korea one year after the case prove in actuality who wrecks peace and harasses the improvement of the north-south relations.
					
					 The more loudly the U.S. and the south Korean group of traitors grow in blaming the DPRK for the case, the more glaringly they will reveal their ugly colors as the anti-DPRK confrontation maniacs who shamelessly make the profound confusion of right and wrong.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Defusing Inter-Korean Confrontation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Defusing Inter-Korean Confrontation
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- It is an urgent task for independent and peaceful reunification of the country to improve the inter-Korean relations, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a bylined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 If the north-south relations are to improve, it is necessary, above all, to defuse the confrontation between them and realize positive dialogue. 
					
					 Dialogue between the north and the south is a basic way for achieving national reconciliation, unity, peace and reunification. 
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK to improve the inter-Korean relations and pave a wide avenue for peace and reunification by promoting dialogue.
					
					 Dialogue serves as driving force for improving the inter-Korean relations and achieving peace and reunification whereas a denial of dialogue amounts to a criminal act of bedeviling those relations and bringing the danger of war. 
					
					 The Koreans in the north and the south desire peace, not confrontation, and aspire after reunification, not division. 
					
					 The reunification movement organizations and progressives of different strata in south Korea strongly urge the authorities to come out for inter-Korean dialogue without any condition. Strong voices calling for dialogue and peace are heard among overseas Koreans, too. 
					
					 The south Korean ruling forces would be well advised to face up to the trend of the times and clearly understand the wishes of the whole nation and properly approach dialogue. 
					
					 Inter-Korean dialogue is by no means a gift for someone. It is a crucial issue related to the destiny of the nation and the prospect of the inter-Korean relations. Desiring dialogue means patriotism and reunification whereas the denial of it means treachery and an anti- reunification action.

articles.title: Peace Is Most Universal Ideal of Mankind--Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Peace Is Most Universal Ideal of Mankind--Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- Peace is the most universal ideal of mankind because this meets the intrinsic requirement of mankind, observes Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a bylined article. 
					 The popular masses who consider independence as their life and soul wish to live and develop independently prompted by their intrinsic need, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Aggression and war impose immeasurable misfortunes, sufferings, destruction and plunder upon people whereas peace guarantees their progress and development. That is why peace is the common desire and the most universal ideal of the people of all countries who wish to live and develop independently. 
					
					 The imperialists are now talking about "disarmament" and "detente," but the international situation still remains complicated and tense. There go on in the international arena sharp confrontation and struggle between socialism and imperialism and between progress and reaction. 
					
					 The reality calls upon the world progressives interested in peace to turn out as one in the struggle to prevent war and defend peace. 
					
					 Peace never comes of itself but it can be achieved only through a staunch struggle to frustrate the imperialists' moves for aggression and war. 
					
					 When the world peace-loving people unite close under the banner of independence and peace against imperialism and war and wage a courageous struggle, they can frustrate the imperialists' moves for aggression and war and achieve the human cause of peace. 
					
					 The Korean people will as ever struggle to realize mankind's common idea of peace in unity with the world progressives.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Confrontational Moves Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Confrontational Moves Denounced
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers have staged big war exercises simulating naval battle, anti-submarine operation and anti-aircraft battle in the East, West and South Seas of Korea for three days with various type warships involved, driving the situation to an extreme pitch of tension.
					 In another development the puppet Ministry of Unification floated a "brochure on policy toward the north" which said that "there is no fundamental change in the attitude of the north and it is hard to find sincerity in it", "a responsible measure is necessary to cope with armed provocation" and "the south will maintain principle."
					
					 It even organized "inspection" of "Cheonan" and took human scum to Paekryong Island where they scattered anti-DPRK leaflets.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Saturday observes:
					
					 Those acts are hysterical spasm of the criminals who are much upset by the truth about the "Cheonan" sinking being disclosed with each passing day.
					
					 Lurking behind this is their scheme to blame the sinking on the north and make it a fait accompli and justify and escalate their moves for a war against their fellow countrymen in the DPRK.
					
					 The conservative group of south Korea thinks it can bury into oblivion the hideous conspiratorial farce orchestrated by it and bring down the DPRK through persistent racket for confrontation and war against it. But it is no more than a pipedream.
					
					 Truth is bound to be disclosed and the criminals punished.
					
					 No matter how desperately the south Korean authorities may try to shift the blame for the warship sinking on to the DPRK, they will only meet stern punishment by the nation.

articles.title: Police Authorities' Outrages against Students Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Police Authorities' Outrages against Students Protested in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The puppet police and university management sides of south Korea are getting more undisguised in their suppression of students' actions for the solution of the issue of registration fee, according to Kyungyang Daily News of south Korea on Mar. 22.
					 On Mar. 11 the police authorities turned down under an unreasonable pretext the application made by the national registration fee network and the Federation of University Students in the 21st Century for holding a meeting denouncing the registration fee hike and urging the authorities to fulfil their promise to cut down the registration fee by half in solidarity with civic and social organizations. 
					
					 The police issued a summons to the chairperson of the General Student Council of Ehwa Woman's University to appear in court several times on the charge of violation of "laws on assembly and demonstration" for the mere reason that she shouted slogans at a press conference held by the group of general student councils for settling the issue of registration fee. 
					
					 The management side of Sogang University not only blocked a meeting of students denouncing the hike of registration fee but took disciplinary actions against four leading students including the chairman of the university general student council on Mar. 9 for sponsoring it. 
					
					 Conveying this fact, the daily noted that the protest actions still going on though the fixing of the registration fee for this year is over prove that the students' grievances have pent up so much.

articles.title: More Facts about Cheonan Case Disclosed in S. Korea
articles.content:
More Facts about "Cheonan" Case Disclosed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that the DPRK-targeted joint military exercises were staged when the warship "Cheonan" went to the bottom of the sea, said the south Korean Internet newspaper Thongil News on Mar. 24.
					 Just after the occurrence of the case the south Korean authorities asserted that the ship's sinking near the Paekryong Island had nothing to do with the military drills that were waged in the sea west of the Thaean Peninsula of South Chungchong Province.
					
					 A soldier witness wrote in his written statement that he heard an exploding sound and saw a white flash from where the Paekryong Island is located at the time of "Cheonan's" sinking. He later said that a warship fired shells from Tumunjin northwest of Paekryong Island. It is only recently that this fact was made known to the public
					 "It sounded boom as to shock me," he wrote, adding "I heard the fire of our battleship from Tumunjin that day and the one I heard at 21:23 sounded more loudly."
					
					 According to the daybooks on the joint military exercises procured by the media, there were the naval maneuvering and supply drill from 11:00 to 13:00 and naval anti-special war unit operational drill from 14:00 to 21:00 that day.
					
					 It was also revealed that the south Korean puppet navy patrol ship "Sokcho," which fired shells toward the north soon after the sinking incident, was carrying out its guard operation in waters where it was on duty.
					
					 "As there is fresh doubt about the case, the Ministry of Defense is required to disclose not only the firing exercise in Tumunjin that day but only the information about Foal Eagle military drill and other facts", said the secretary general of the Citizen's Solidarity for Democratic Society.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as NDC Chairman Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as NDC Chairman Observed
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The Russian newspaper Vremya Perementeve on March 16 carried a special write-up illustrated with a portrait of General Secretary Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of his election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 In an article the paper said that his election provided a sure guarantee for the DPRK's demonstration of its might as an invincible military power. 
					
					 It went on to say:
					
					 He has turned the Korean People's Army into an elite one.
					
					 He led all the people to turn out as one in defending the country, tightly holding arms in their hands under so rigorous situation late in the last century.
					
					 He has directed big efforts to developing the defence industry. 
					
					 He has made ceaseless journeys for inspection to KPA units, showing loving care for servicepersons as their real parents would do. 
					
					 The DPRK led by Kim Jong Il will always demonstrate its might as an invincible military power which no formidable enemy dare attack.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Relief Fund to Koreans in Japan--VOA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Relief Fund to Koreans in Japan--VOA
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- VOA reported about news that General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent relief fund of 500,000 U.S. dollars to Korean residents in Japan who suffered from the mega earthquake and tsunami.

articles.title: US Paper on Fukushima Nuclear Power Plant
articles.content:
US Paper on Fukushima Nuclear Power Plant
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The U.S. newspaper Wall Street Journal on Monday cited data to report that "the Fukushima nuclear power plant was one of the plants with many accidents in Japan" before the recent mega earthquake.
					 It said that the number of accidents in the Fukushima nuclear power plant from 2005 to 2009 recorded 15, the highest in accident rate among the plants with three or more reactors.

articles.title: Chinese FM Spokeswoman on Measures Following Nuclear Crisis in Japan
articles.content:
Chinese FM Spokeswoman on Measures Following Nuclear Crisis in Japan 
 Beijing, March 24 (KCNA) -- A spokeswoman for the Foreign Ministry of China, at a briefing on March 22, referred to China's steps following the accident at nuclear power plant in Japan.
					 She said that the State General Administration of Quality Supervision, Inspection and Quarantine requested the inspection and quarantine offices to carry out substantial examinations at ports and scan foodstuffs imported from Japan for radiation exposure in view of the severity of the accident at the Fukushima nuclear power plant.
					
					 China is deeply concerned about the release of radioactive materials into the atmosphere from the troubled power plant, she said. 
					
					 China considers that the accident put the whole world on alert, she said, hoping that Japan would provide the world with timely, accurate and comprehensive information.

articles.title: China Plans to Launch Meteorological Satellites
articles.content:
China Plans to Launch Meteorological Satellites
 Beijing, March 24 (KCNA) -- China is planning to launch 13 meteorological satellites from this year till 2020. 
					 The implementation of this plan would help boost the capability for meteorological observation including greenhouse gas emissions, lightening, sun activity, etc. 
					
					 China has successfully launched 11 meteorological satellites so far.

articles.title: China to Increase Standard of Politics and Law
articles.content:
China to Increase Standard of Politics and Law
 Beijing, March 24 (KCNA) -- Zhou Yongkang stressed the need to increase the standard of politics and law at the 17th meeting of the Central Commission of Politics and Law held in Beijing on March 18.  He is member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party of China and secretary of the Central Commission of Politics and Law.
					 He called upon all the organs of politics and law at different levels to get used to the new situation in which the 12th Five-Year Plan began to be implemented and to the new expectation of the popular masses in the spirit of the meetings of the National People's Congress and the National Committee of the People's Political Consultative Conference. Doing so is necessary to increase the overall standard of politics and law and provide a guarantee for the economic and social development in the period of the plan, he added.

articles.title: Government Statistics Institute Inaugurated in China
articles.content:
Government Statistics Institute Inaugurated in China 
 Beijing, March 24 (KCNA) -- The government statistics institute of Chinese People's University was inaugurated.
					 The Director of the State Statistical Bureau of China in a speech at the inaugural ceremony on Mar. 18 said that the inauguration made it possible for China to push ahead with the work of strengthening the scientific research into statistics and training experts in this field.

articles.title: Handbooks of Practical Use for Party Branch Work in Army Distributed in China
articles.content:
Handbooks of Practical Use for Party Branch Work in Army Distributed in China
						
 Beijing, March 24 (KCNA) -- The General Political Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army recently distributed handbooks of practical use for party branch work in the army to the basic units of the whole army and the armed police. 
					 The department called on all the servicepersons to study the book together with "the regulations on political work" and "the regulations on the work of the party committee" so as to steadily boost the creative ingenuity, unity and combat ability of the basic party organizations and promote scientific development in building them.

articles.title: Military Operation in Libya Condemned in Russia
articles.content:
Military Operation in Libya Condemned in Russia 
 Moscow, March 24 (KCNA) -- The director of the Institute of Oriental Studies of the Russian Academy of Sciences recently denounced the military operation kicked off by the U.S. and the West against Libya.
					 The UN Security Council Resolution 1973 stipulates only the imposing of no-fly zone over Libya, he said, adding that massive bombing on Libya shows that the West-led coalition forces pursue another purpose, the regime change in Libya.

articles.title: AU Chairperson Rejects Military Intervention in Libya
articles.content:
AU Chairperson Rejects Military Intervention in Libya 
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- Jean Ping, chairperson of the African Union, on Tuesday clarified the stand against the military intervention of the U.S. and the West in Libya.
					 The AU rejected the intervention not only at the United Nations but on many other occasions, he said, holding that it can never be justified.
					
					 The Libyan crisis should be settled through dialogue, he said, calling upon the countries concerned to make joint efforts for it.

articles.title: Indiscriminate Use of Arms against Libya Assailed
articles.content:
Indiscriminate Use of Arms against Libya Assailed 
						
 Moscow, March 24 (KCNA) -- Dmitri Rogozin, permanent representative of Russia at NATO, at a recent press conference clarified the stand against the indiscriminate use of arms against Libya.
					 He said that the massive use of arms there may trigger off the escalation of dispute and uncontrollable chain reaction.

articles.title: Algeria Opposes Military Intervention in Libya
articles.content:
Algeria Opposes Military Intervention in Libya
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- Algerian Foreign Minister Mourad Medelci clarified the stand against the military intervention in Libya. Mourad Medelci and his Russian counterpart gave a joint press conference in Algiers on Tuesday.
					 He said that the intervention rendered the situation in Libya more complicated, adding that Algeria rejects the West military intervention as it runs diametrically counter to the resolution of the United Nations.

articles.title: US Involvement in Libya Protested
articles.content:
US Involvement in Libya Protested
						
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- A demonstration against the U.S. involvement in the war in Libya took place in Chicago on Mar. 19 with participation of thousands of people.
					 Carrying such banners as "No war", the demonstrators marched on the street. "Leave the money for healthcare, jobs and school, not the war," demonstrators shouted.

articles.title: West Incites Instability in Region: Iran's Navy Commander
articles.content:
West Incites Instability in Region: Iran's Navy Commander
 Tehran, March 24 (KCNA) -- Iran's Navy Commander in his TV appearance on Mar. 20 deplored the presence of Western powers in the Persian Gulf, saying that they are inciting instability in the region. 
					 He stressed that regional countries are capable of establishing security in the Persian Gulf.

articles.title: Pakistani Tribesmen to Take Revenge of Drone Attack
articles.content:
Pakistani Tribesmen to Take Revenge of Drone Attack 
						
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The chief of North Waziristan Grand Jirga of Pakistan, Malik Jalal, condemned the killings of 41 tribesmen in the recent strikes by the U.S. drone aircraft in the country's tribal region.
					 Pakistani tribesmen will not forgive and forget the blood of innocent people in brutal U.S. strikes, he said, adding, "We will take revenge of the blood of our people."
					
					 He demanded that the government lodge protest against the drone attack.

articles.title: Worldwide Urban Water Crisis
articles.content:
Worldwide Urban Water Crisis
						
 Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- Water crisis is growing more serious worldwide, arousing concern. 
					 The number of urban dwellers who lack access to a water tap in their homes or someplace nearby has grown to around 114 million while the number of those who lack access to the most basic sanitation facilities has risen by 134 million, according to UN research data on March 22.

articles.title: Lider del PSPM elogia politica de Songun
articles.content:
Lider del PSPM elogia politica de Songun
Pyongyang, 26 de marzo (ATCC) -- Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Socialista del Pueblo de Mexico, se encontro el dia 18 con Kwon Sung Chol, embajador coreano acreditado en Cuba, quien participo en el XV simposio de los partidos politicos del mundo sobre la construccion de nueva sociedad en calidad de delegado del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					  En la ocasion, Jesus dijo que la politica de Songun del Dirigente Kim Jong Il tiene su raiz en la inmortal idea Juche y es el remedio omnipotente que defiende la dignidad y la soberania del pais y la nacion y acelera la construccion socialista en general haciendo frente a las constantes maniobras de agresion militar de los imperialistas norteamericanos.
					
					  Destaco que bajo la bandera del Songun, el Dirigente guia incansablemente la lucha del pueblo coreano por construir una gran potencia prospera y la causa de independencia del mundo.
					
					  Senalo que su partido apoya totalmente los proyectos del PTC sobre la reunificacion de la patria y desea que Corea se reunifique segun el Proyecto de la Fundacion de la Republica Federal Democratica de Coryo.
					
					  Anadio que el PSPM aprecia mucho las relaciones con el PTC conducido por el Dirigente y seguira desarrollandolas tambien en lo adelante.

articles.title: Medardo Gonzalez aboga por desarrollar relaciones con PTC
articles.content:
Medardo Gonzalez aboga por desarrollar relaciones con PTC 
Pyongyang, 26 de marzo (ATCC) -- Medardo Gonzalez, coordinador general del Frente Farabundo Marti para la Liberacion Nacional de El Salvador, se reunio el dia 17 con el embajador coreano en Cuba, Kwon Sung Chol, quien participo en el XV simposio de los partidos politicos del mundo sobre la construccion de nueva sociedad en calidad de delegado del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					En la ocasion, el deseo que el PTC y el pueblo coreano logren grandes exitos en la lucha por construir una gran potencia prospera y reunificar la patria por via pacifica bajo la direccion del Songun de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il.
					
					Puntualizo que su organizacion se esforzara activamente en el futuro tambien por fortalecer las relaciones con el PTC.

articles.title: ?Por que estan atrapados en caso de "Cheonan"?, comentario de ATCC
articles.content:
?Por que estan atrapados en caso de "Cheonan"?, comentario de ATCC
Pyongyang, 26 de marzo (ATCC) --  Hoy en dia, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana se encuentra en la peor fase de la historia repitiendo el ciclo vicioso de enfrentamiento y conflicto. 
					La culpa de eso recae sobre las autoridades surcoreanas que mantienen la postura conflictiva pretextando obstinadamente el caso de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan" y el de canonazos en la isla Yonphyong, en lugar de aceptar la propuesta de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de abrir incondicionalmente el dialogo intercoreano. 
					
					Como ya hemos aclarado, el caso de "Cheonan" es la primera provocacion premeditada para ejercer la presion militar total sobre la RPDC en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras y el canonazo en la isla Yonphyong es la segunda para desatar la guerra de agresion contra ella. 
					
					Ahora, las fuerzas belicistas surcoreanas consideran el caso de "Cheonan" como mejor pretexto para implementar su politica de confrontacion con la RPDC.
					
					Este ano, las autoridades surcoreanas llevaron al fracaso el dialogo previo para las conversaciones militares de alto nivel Norte-Sur vinculando injustamente el incidente de "Cheonan" con la RPDC. 
					
					Por otra parte, desplegaron con EE.UU. en toda la extension surcoreana los ejercicios belicos conjuntos de gran envergadura "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle" con el fin de provocar la guerra anti-RPDC. 
					
					Al abogar abiertamente por salir de la "concepcion de defensa para frenar el desembarco" y convertirla en la ofensiva, pretenden reforzar mas de 27 mil efectivos en el cuerpo de marines. La mayoria de los nuevos infantes de marina se ubicaran en los alrededores de la linea de demarcacion militar del Mar Oeste donde persisten extremadas tensiones militares entre ambas partes coreanas. 
					
					Ademas, elaboraron el plan de fortificacion de 5 islas en el Mar Oeste, segun el cual pretenden emplazar en ellas hasta el ano 2012 los canones automotor "K-9", el radar ultramoderno "Acer", los misiles tierra-aire y otros muchos medios sofisticados de combate. 
					
					Pretextando el caso de "Cheonan", el Ministerio de Defensa Nacional del Sur de Corea intenta aumentar en gran medida las fuerzas armadas frente a la combatividad asimetrica de la RPDC. 
					
					El "plan 307", recien presentado por esa cartera como tarea de reforma de defensa nacional, establece abiertamente que se invertirian enormes fondos en la compra de equipos belicos ultramodernos como cazabombarderos tipo Stealth y drones de espionaje. 
					
					?Quien propuso el dialogo multilateral entre el Norte y el Sur sin atraparse en el pasado y se esfuerza por abrirlo? 
					
					?Quien se burla de la contraparte de dialogo cuestionando la "sinceridad" y despliega los ejercicios belicos en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras adquiriendo ultramodernos equipos de guerra?
					
					Las respuestas a esas preguntas estan en los mencionados eventos politico-militares que acontecen en las relaciones intercoreanas cuando se cumple el primer aniversario del incidente de "Cheonan".
					
					Aunque EE.UU. y la banda de traidores surcoreanos hablan tanto de la "responsabilidad" de alguien, no podran ocultar su asquerosa fachada de maniacos de enfrentamiento con la RPDC ni su cinismo con que invierten la verdad.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exige eliminar el estado de enfrentamiento N-S
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exige eliminar el estado de enfrentamiento N-S
Pyongyang, 26 de marzo (ATCC) -- En un articulo individual difundido este sabado, el diario Rodong Sinmun senalo que el mejoramiento de las relaciones Norte-Sur es la tarea apremiante para la reunificacion independiente y pacifica del pais.
					Para ello, hay que eliminar el estado conflictivo y sostener activamente el dialogo, comienza el articulista y continua:
					
					Las conversaciones Norte-Sur son el remedio fundamental por la reconciliacion, la unidad, la paz y la reunificacion de la nacion.
					
					Es invariable la posicion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de mejorar las relaciones con el Sur y abrir el camino de paz y reunificacion mediante el dialogo.
					
					La negativa al dialogo es acto criminal que destruye las relaciones intercoreanas y trae el peligro de guerra.
					
					Toda la nacion coreana del Norte y el Sur no desea la confrontacion ni la division sino la paz y la reunificacion.
					
					Ahora, las entidades surcoreanas del movimiento de reunificacion y las personalidades progresistas de diferentes sectores del Sur de Corea demandan fuertemente a las autoridades que se sienten incondicionalmente a la mesa de conversaciones con el Norte. Suben de tono tambien entre los compatriotas radicados en el extranjero las voces demandando el dialogo y la paz.
					
					Las fuerzas en el poder surcoreano deben tomar la posicion y actitud correctas sobre el dialogo viendo bien la corriente de la epoca y la demanda de toda la nacion coreana.
					
					El dialogo Norte-Sur no es un regalo de una parte a la otra sino el problema importante relacionado con el destino de la nacion y el futuro de las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					Aspirar al dialogo significa el patriotismo y la reunificacion y negarlo constituye la traicion a la patria y un acto anti-reunificacion.
